sources.title: The Burglar's Slide for Life
sources.description: Title: The Burglar's Slide for Life Summary: A burglar escapes from the apartment he's robbing by sliding down the clothesline, but in the end he's caught by the family dog. Directed by: Edwin S. Porter. A burglar escapes from the apartment he's robbing by sliding down the clothesline, but in the end he's caught by the family dog." /> Actors: Production Company: Edison Manufacturing Company Release Date: July 1905 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A burglar escapes from the apartment he's robbing by sliding down the clothesline, but in the end he's caught by the family dog.

metadata.Plot: A burglar escapes from the apartment he's robbing by sliding down the clothesline, but in the end he's caught by the family dog.
